amendment.description: To amend title 32, United States Code, to increase the maximum Federal share of the costs of State programs under the National Guard Challenge Program for fiscal year 2004, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 821 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S6900-6901, S6902; text: CR S6900) To amend title 32, United States Code, to increase the maximum Federal share of the costs of State programs under the National Guard Challenge Program for fiscal year 2004, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 821 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 821 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
